subject: Steroids
Horse Racing
Big Brown (Race Horse)
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Drug Abuse and Traffic
Belmont Stakes
Testosterone
lead_paragraph: When Big Brown and his rivals compete in the Belmont Stakes on Saturday, horse racing will still be in the midst of its steroid era.
